XII.ii.3.C.3.c
.
Maintaining Control of MBR Requests
Add the
Other Request
tracked item with a suspense date that is five business days from the current date to control both the first and second requests for an MBR.
If there is no reply after submission of a second request, refer the case to the SSA district office liaison for REPS claims.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
